verbs.description: atiku rubs buhari nose in endorsement by the economist [ARG1: this] [V: is] [ARG2: the second endorsement in as many months by the world number one economic and policy magazine] an endorsement based on the clarity of vision and the detailed policies of the pdp candidate when compared to the vague and empty promises of the incumbent all progressive congress administration of president muhammadu buhari the statement read muhammadu buhari congress alhaji lai mohammed sahara reporters the economist magazine peoples democratic party alhaji atiku abubakar the economist nigeria atiku abubakar president muhammadu buhari atiku presidential organisation
